name: AshScend
description:
AshScend - Ascend on the ashes of your foes
Made for LOWREZJAM 2022

Give evil critters a taste of your fiery rage, pile their ashes high and climb out of the pit!

As you ascend the rungs of the pit of ash, you (and your flamethrower) will gain new devastating powers!

★ Controls ★
Arrows: move - Z: jump - X: shoot
-or-
W/a/s/d: move - Space: jump - Shift: shoot

If the game doesn't respond, try clicking on the playfield

★ Trivia ★
Game written in C with a homemade mini engine, web version compiled with Emscripten
